products.title: Chimera Purity Blue Roman Blind
products.description: What could possibly be more serene that this delivery of serenity blue bordering the softest of off-white tones, coming all together to create chimera purity blue. And pure this roman blind truly is, with linen textures throughout as well as a whole host of softness. Team with what could possibly be more serene that this delivery of serenity blue bordering the softest of off-white tones, coming all together to create chimera purity blue.

products.title: Accents Navy Roman Blind
products.description: Navy and cream, it's a combination that works so well and not just in a nautical theme (though we love that thought too), it's a timeless pairing that will enhance any room in your home. The lightness of the cream keeps your home feeling bright and spacious while the dark navy ad navy and cream, it's a combination that works so well and not just in a nautical theme (though we love that thought too), it's a timeless pairing that will enhance any room in your home.

products.title: Manor Navy Roman Blind
products.description: As you could probably guess from the name, this roman blind is born for manor houses, with the combination of a traditional linen roman blind and gorgeous navy blue borders. Its this teaming of textures that allows the manor navy to bring a softer touch to your windows, dress as you could probably guess from the name, this roman blind is born for manor houses, with the combination of a traditional linen roman blind and gorgeous navy blue borders.
